caption: A smooth jazz lounge track with brushed drums, walking upright bass, and mellow saxophone lead. Features sophisticated piano voicings, subtle vibraphone accents, and a relaxed swing feel perfect for a late-night cocktail bar.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Smoke curls up in the dim lit room
Saxophone plays a midnight tune
Strangers meet with a knowing glance
Would you care to share this dance

[Chorus]
In the blue hour of the night
Everything feels just right
Let the music set the mood
Jazz and wine and solitude

[Verse 2]
Ice cubes clink in a crystal glass
Moments like these they never last
But tonight we'll make them stay
Let tomorrow fade away

[Sax Solo]

[Verse 3]
The pianist plays with gentle hands
Only the night understands
These melodies of love and loss
Worth whatever it may cost

[Chorus]
In the blue hour of the night
Everything feels just right
Let the music set the mood
Jazz and wine and solitude

[Outro]
Jazz and wine and solitude
